name: The Construct
description:
New character - The Construct! 

Recent changes: 
- Added 2 new potions (+config option) 
- Anticipate: Block 10 -> 11
- Backfire now hits you first.
- Bunker++ retains a card.
- Hyper Beam dazed 2 -> 3, mega-upgrade damage 100 -> 85.
- Shield Generator+ blur stays at 4.
- Most relics' rarities increased.
- Blazing Speed VFX.
- Ring of Chaos compatibility.
- Lots of bugfixes and wording.

Want to test some experimental new cards?
Look in the config menu!
